description: Navigate to Miyaakiyomotodo Pharmacy. The route proceeds straight north along the main road (Prefectural Road 32), staying on the side with the covered sidewalk. You will pass the large 'ROUND1' building on your left and the 'BAL' building across the street on your right. The path continues straight for approximately 59 meters.
